content.question: Crowding out occurs when

choices.label: increases in government spending become ineffective because tax revenues increase as income increases
government borrowing to finance its spending decreases private sector investment
monetary policy actions decrease the effectiveness of fiscal policy
restrictive monetary policy causes the interest rate to increase
government spending and private sector spending increase by the same percentage rate

content.answer: government borrowing to finance its spending decreases private sector investment

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
